docs.title: Who am I?
docs.text:
I'm a python developer with almost 20 years of experience. I've worked on a wide range of projects, from small websites to large scale data processing pipelines.

I'm based near El Bolsón, Río Negro, deep within the Argentinian Andes. I live with my wife and 8 year old. Not willing to relocate, only interested in remote positions. Here's why:

My life is split between my family, my work and a many other interests among which: training and playing rugby, building infrastructure for my farm & everything about the guitar

docs.title: Code
docs.text:
I mainly use Gitlab now, but i have a few projects on Github. Here's a selection:

Selected Project Description bosminer-py Python client to retrieve data from any miner running Braiins OS+ Socket API. antminer-py Python client to retrieve data from AntMiners stock firmware (reverse engineered) REST API. media-watchdog Screen a path for updates and publish changes to rabbitmq Nameko InfluxDB metrics A nameko microservice to write/read to/from influxdb (inspired by Grafana query builder). Grafane A very opinionated influxdb client that uses the official python client and is very much inspired in grafana's query builder. lechuga Retrieve usd/ars rates from the cli leaflet.map.zoomToGeometries A leaflet plugin to zoom to a geojson geometry
